WRITING.TITLE: The CW 2017-18 TV Schedule. 'Arrow' moves to Thursdays. 'Jane the Virgin' to Fridays

WRITING.TEXT: actually, I think you're right. mmmmm.....maybe that's why I was getting downvoted.
* Magic City * Scream Queens * Scream - not this reboot

The Missing season 2 was the most intriguing of the lot. Everyone should see this. Great stuff (despite the sloppy ending).
I enjoyed The OA until they introduced the weird dance sequences.
